name: Super Rock Blasters! (itch)
description:
version 1.3

What is Super Rock Blasters?

Super Rock Blasters is a fun local multiplayer Asteroids / Space War mashup style arcade shooter where you blast friends into smithereens. Play with 2 to 4 friends (or enemies) for fast paced competitive fun!

TLDR: 4-Player Battle Asteroids on LSD

New in Version 1.0

  • AI - That's right, SRB finally supports single player!
  • Flying Saucers - They appear at random and cause chaos
  • 10 New Arenas - The odds of successfully navigating them is 3,720 to 1
  • Improved Menus - The old menus were pretty weak

Key Features

  • competitive local multiplayer game play, 2 to 4 players
  • fast paced matches that leave you wanting revenge
  • vector line art to feed those feelings of nostalgia
  • AI to sharpen your skills against
  • no additional quarters necessary for continued play

Credits

  • Zenas - Programming & Production
  • Christian - Programming

Requirements

  • Windows (7+), OS X (10.7+), or Linux (Ubuntu 12+)
  • A graphics card that's less than 10 years old. (SM 2.0+)
  • A CPU from this millennium. (SSE2+)
  • 1-4 Controllers that your computer has drivers for. (XBOX 360/One, PS3/4, Logitech, etc) (Supported Controllers)

Coming Soonish

  • A cooperative/single player mode
  • Arcade Cabinet Support (we haven't forgotten you guys!)
